name: Momentum Madness
description:
Hey,

welcome to my first game called "Momentum Madness".  It was developed during the 48 hour GMTK gamejam with the theme "Out of control".

It is a small game made by me and my wife. The core concept is a platformer without control about the movment direction and speed. Reaction checks and mindgames are the core components in this concept.

Unfortunatly, time ran out and we had to scrap half of our levels. Additionally, there is no sound.

Thank you for playing!
